item.description:
Join us for a fun night as we check out the newly opened Back Bay Social Club on Boylston Street, Boston. The restaurant will be providing complimentary bar snacks for us to enjoy. Have a fun time meeting new people, relaxing, enjoying dinner/drinks and checking out this new place.

Each member is responsible for their own food/drink cost. If you have trouble finding us, please call Catherine at 774 232 0000.

Look forward to seeing you there!
item.how_to_find_us: Please look for Catherine inside the entrance or at our table, if you need help finding us, please call 774 232 0000.
item.name: Dinner, Drinks, Free Apps and Fun at New Back Bay Social Club
